note.p: Freemason, initiated, 3 June 1765 at Emergency Meeting of Provincial Grand Lodge, Cheshire
References: The Library and Museum of Freemasonry 'Freemasons and the Royal Society; Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' 2010, page 24
Notes: Name appears on PL until 1790; death announced at anniversary meeting of 30 November 1790.
